title: Gold player looking for duo partner to climb ladder. Not looking to get carried, will  pull my own
body:
Hi all, I used to be a platinum player in previous seasons (highest was plat 3), but due to work commitments I had to stop playing for about a year.

I'm now getting back into LoL. (And finally transferred from US to Oceanic, the ping difference omg!)

Looking for someone fun/chill to climb the ladder with as the grind gets boring alone. Please do note, I'm very rusty so I need someone who can handle the inevitable losses in a mature way, while I regain my skills. I can't guarantee a quick climb, but I can guarantee I never rage, actually ENJOY the game and will always try my damndest to win games.

I live in Australia (Sydney) and play on most evenings and lots on weekends. If interested please PM me and I will reply with my summoner name. Thank you!

IGN: Excalipooper
